Get to know me

I have lived in NC for almost my whole life. I enjoy reading and watching movies or shows like GOT. Although recently I have have been getting more into outside activies. I want to learn how to box and I will try to learn how to snowboard next year. Although I really love doing those things my true passion lies in coding. I am always trying to improve my skills by building cool projects. I enjoy learning new techonologies and im currently trying to become a master the art of python
